subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
Lotteries
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bulls beat the odds to earn the right to take one of the two consensus top choices in the draft, Derrick Rose of Memphis or Michael Beasley of Kansas State.
snippet: The Chicago Bulls beat the odds to earn the right to take one of the two consensus top choices in the draft, Derrick Rose of Memphis or Michael Beasley of Kansas State.
